author: Huawei
description:
When natural disasters strike, staying connected takes more than infrastructure repairs. It takes people who can respond with care when communication matters most.

#Huawei's Technical Assistance Center (TAC) based in Queretaro, Mexico, supports communication services across Latin America. Its teams operate 24 hours a day, combining technical expertise with human understanding to help restore communication during critical moments.

Watch how this TAC team of 200+ experts works behind the scenes to keep people connected when every call counts: https://bit.ly/4qHxh2N
title: When Every Call Counts: Human-Centered Support Keeps Us Connected
